item.description:
Join Europhiles, Foodies, Spanish speakers and Global Citizens for a $10 Brazilian barbecue buffet.

Fellow member, Gianni is the Cafe Belo Host. He has made these special arrangements, so you must be certain you're able to attend to ensure an accurate reservation.

Cafe Belo Menu

At 9 PM there will be live music in the lounge.


Update from Gianni August 12th :
We have about 28 people reserved and seating for 40 in the VIP section of Cafe Belo just for us.
All has been confirmed and we will be meeting there at 7pm. Dinner (buffet) is $10.00 excluding gratuity, tax and beverages. See you there this Saturday the 14th of August !!!!



Public Transportation: Create your own train and/or bus route here MBTA or Hop Stop
Orange Line subway to Wellington Station then
Bus 110 Wonderland Via Woodlawn then
get off at Broadway & Everett Square

Directions:
Check out Google to arrange your driving directions

Parking:
Complimentary parking on the side of the restaurant

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Jantar a Cafe Belo Everett
